Uses of Interface
squidpony.squidai.astar.Connection

Packages that use Connection 
Package Description
squidpony.squidai.astar  

  • Uses of Connection in squidpony.squidai.astar

    Classes in squidpony.squidai.astar that implement Connection 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CostlyConnection<N>
    A CostlyConnection is a Connection that can have different costs for different instances.
    class  DefaultConnection<N>
    A DefaultConnection is a Connection whose cost is 1.
    Fields in squidpony.squidai.astar with type parameters of type Connection 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    ArrayList<List<Connection<Coord>>> DefaultGraph.allConnections  
    Methods in squidpony.squidai.astar that return types with arguments of type Connection 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    List<Connection<Coord>> DefaultGraph.getConnections​(Coord fromNode)
    Returns the connections outgoing from the given node.
    List<Connection<N>> Graph.getConnections​(N fromNode)
    Returns the connections outgoing from the given node.
    Method parameters in squidpony.squidai.astar with type arguments of type Connection 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void Pathfinder.generateConnectionPath​(N startNode, List<Connection<N>> outPath)  
    boolean Pathfinder.searchConnectionPath​(N startNode, N endNode, Heuristic<N> heuristic, List<Connection<N>> outPath)
    Performs a non-interruptible search, trying to find a path made up of connections from the start node to the goal node attempting to honor costs provided by the graph.
